general.navigateAwayMessage: If you leave the {0} now, your changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to close the {0}?
general.title: Canvas

home.caption: Why not turn your favourite moments, landscapes or even your kids drawings into stunning wall decorations?

edit.colorButtonTooltip: Click here to use the original photo
edit.grayScaleButtonTooltip: Click here to apply the black and white effect
edit.sepiaButtonTooltip: Click here to apply the sepia effect
edit.zoomIn: Click to make the photo larger
edit.zoomOut: Click to make the photo smaller
edit.lowQualityTooltip: quality too low for current frame
edit.photoQualityIndicatorTooltipLow: The quality of the photo is too low to guarantee an optimal result. You can, of course, order the {0} in any case, but the result may not be sharp.
edit.photoQualityIndicatorTooltipMedium: The quality of the photo is less than optimal. You can, of course, order the {0} in any case, but the result may not be sharp.
edit.photoQualityIndicatorTooltipHigh: The quality of the photo is good.
edit.photoQualityIndicatorTooltipExcellent: The quality of the photo is excellent.
edit.uploadPhotoButtonTooltip: Click here to add a photo

addPhotoButton.tooltip: Click here to add a photo

layout.title: Select a layout
layout.subtitle: Change the number of photos below

customer.title: Personal details
customer.subscribeToNewsletter: Keep up to date with the latest photo book news, useful tips and promotions.

order.numberOfCopiesDescription: (select the desired number of copies here)
order.promoDescription: Do you have a promotion code? Enter the code below.
order.promotionPopupSubtitle: The promotion code you entered is invalid. Enter a valid promotion code or order without promotion code

upload.uploading: Your photo is being sent & uploaded to us. %3%%
upload.busyUploadingLabel: Your photo is being sent to us so that Albelli can place it on your {0} in a high resolution. This may take a few minutes. You don't need to do anything. As soon as we have received the photo, you will be automatically redirected to the payment screen.

warnings.qualityTitle: Watch out: the quality of your image is too low!
warnings.qualitySubtitle: The quality of your image is not optimal for your chosen product. We want to ensure you receive the best print quality possible.
warnings.qualityOptions:
• make the least use of the zoom function;
  • choose a smaller product size;
  • use a higher resolution photograph.
warnings.qualityFooter: For more advice please contact our customer service team.
warnings.qualityButtonProceed: I understand the risks and wish to continue

lessPlaceholdersThanPhotos.message: You have selected a photo layout that contains fewer photos than the current page. If you continue, {0} photo(s) will be removed from the current page. Are you sure?

errors.errorBootstrapping: An error occurred during start-up. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.countryList: An error occurred while retrieving the country list. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.browserWarning: Sorry, you can’t design a product in this web browser. Please install the Google Chrome Browser to continue.
errors.lowMemoryWarning: Were you trying to add a photo? It looks like your device is running low on memory. Please close some of your running applications and try again
errors.defaultPrice: An error occurred while retrieving the price information. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.loadPhotoBitmapData: An error occurred while loading the photo. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.creatingPhoto: An error occurred while creating the photo. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.photoRegistration: An error occurred while creating the photo. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.addPhotoToPhotoPlaceholderEmpty: An error occurred while adding the photo to the photo frame. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.addPhotoToPhotoPlaceholder: An error occurred while adding the photo to the photo frame. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.startUploadPhoto: An error occurred while initialising the photo upload. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.setPhotoCanvas: An error occurred while switching between the products. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.createCustomer: An error occurred while collecting the customer details. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.createOrder: An error occurred while creating the invoice details. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.getInvoice: An error occurred while retrieving the invoice details. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.sendOrder: An error occurred while sending the order. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
errors.getPaymentUrl: An error occurred while retrieving the payment details. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.

validations.emailMissingAtSign: There is no @ symbol in the e-mail address.
validations.emailMissingPeriodInDomain: There is no dot (.com) in the e-mail address.
validations.emailDomainInvalidFormatted: The domain of the e-mail address is invalid.
validations.emailTooManyAtCharacters: The e-mail address contains too many @ symbols.
validations.emailConsecutivePeriodsInDomain: The e-mail address contains consecutive dots (.).
validations.emailInvalidChars: The e-mail address contains invalid characters.
validations.emailInvalidIp: The IP address in the domain of the e-mail address is invalid.
validations.emailMissingUsername: The user name is missing in the e-mail address.
validations.textTooLong: The maximum number of characters has been reached.
validations.zipcodeInvalid: invalid postal code, use the format:
